title: Twisted Arrangement 4
description: The world believes mild-mannered Emma Ness is married to gorgeous Hollywood producer Josh Owens. After all, they saw the wedding photos on the cover of People magazine. But no one, aside from her brother and Josh’s best friend, knows that the marriage is a sham, a con designed to convince A-list actor William Ransler that Josh isn’t a womanizing bastard and persuade him to star in Josh’s latest film.With their faux nuptials behind them, Josh and Emma now face four months of pretending to be in love or they risk tipping off Ransler, and the rest of the world, to their deception.But living together and working together, haunted by one night of unparalleled passion, isn’t as easy as either one of them anticipated. Except when it’s too easy. The lines between real life lust and make-believe love blur quickly when you’re forced to see the object of your obsession every day. Fateful events force Josh and Emma to face the reality of their feelings, and just might spell the end of their twisted arrangement. This final installment of the Twisted series features Destiel shipping, dangerous conveyances, passionate embraces, and a little bit of HEA!
author: Mora Early
